Edges-Demonologist -- Female Human Seasoned Demonologist
Attributes (7 Points):
Agility: d8 Smarts: d10 Spirit: d4 Strength: d4 Vigor: d8
Attribute Notes: Anemic: -2 Vigor (resist disease, sickness, fatigue, and environment)
Skills (14 Points):
Athletics: (agi) d4 Intimidation: (spi) d4 Spellcasting: (sma) d10
Battle: (sma) d4 Notice: (sma) d4 Stealth: (agi) d4
Common Knowledge: (sma) d6 Occult: (sma) d4 Thievery: (agi) d4
Fighting: (agi) d4 Persuasion: (spi) d4
Healing: (sma) d4 Repair: (sma) d6
Skill Notes: Hard Of Hearing: -4 Notice (hearing)
Size: 0
Advances: 4 Improvement Points: 12 Improvement Points Allocation: Attribute: 4; Edge: 6; Skill: 2
Features
Edges (4 points): Arcane Background (Demonologist); Hell's Wrath; Infernal Armor; Wizard Hindrances: Anemic; Hard Of Hearing; Secret; Shamed Human Abilities: Adaptable
Feature Notes:
Adaptable: +1 Edge Points
Arcane Background (Demonologist): Has Corruption+ and Summoning features
Secret: Hides knowledge to protect self or others from minor trouble
Shamed: Past event causes self-doubt
Combat
Parry: 7 (3) Cover: 4 Toughness: 6 (0) Pace/Run: 6/+d6
Armor: None Shield: Riot Shield Weapons: Holy Water Spray (None R1"); Sawed-Off Shotgun (3d6 R5"); Spencer Carbine (2d8 R20" AP 2); Unarmed (d4+d0)
Combat Notes:
Fighting Parry Modifier: +2 Parry
Vigor Toughness Modifier: +4
Arcana
Power Count: 5 Power Points: 10
Common Power Modifiers: +1/+2/+3 PP Armor Piercing; +2 PP Fatigue; +1 PP Glow/Shroud; +2 PP Heavy Weapon; +1 PP Hinder/Hurry; +2 PP Lingering Damage; +1/+2 PP Dbl/Tpl Range; +1 PP Selective
Arcana Notes:
Arcane Background (Demonologist): 5 Powers/10 Power Points
Corruption+: Critical failure on arcane skill inflicts additional or increased hindrance until next advance
Hell's Wrath: Bolt, Blast, and Burst inflict +2 damage
Infernal Armor: May cover apparel with a glow that gives self +2 Armor
Summoning: May use Summon Ally to conjure demonic legionnaires for 4 PP, hellhounds for 5 PP
Wizard: May spend 1 Power Point to change a Power trapping
